original: intros a b H n H0. unfold quo. rewrite <- quo_is_quo with (a:=a) (b:=b) (H:=H). rewrite Nat.mul_assoc. rewrite Nat.div_mul_cancel_l; auto. rewrite Nat.mul_comm. reflexivity.
